description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任武汉市市长、成都市市长、中共成都市委书记、中共重庆市委副书记、重庆市人民政府市长。现任安徽省政协主席、党组书记。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, he has served as Mayor of Wuhan, Mayor of Chengdu, Secretary of the CPC Chengdu Municipal Committee, Deputy Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee, and Mayor of the Chongqing Municipal People's Government. He is currently the Chairman and Party Group Secretary of the Anhui Provincial Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 唐良智的出生地，位于中国湖北省。
description.en: The birthplace of Tang Liangzhi, located in Hubei Province, China.

en: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 位于中国武汉市的著名高等学府，唐良智在此获得本科学位和经济学博士学位。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher learning located in Wuhan, China, where Tang Liangzhi obtained his bachelor's degree and a Ph.D. in Economics.

nodes.id: 邮电部邮电科学研究院

zh-cn: 邮电部邮电科学研究院

description.zh-cn: 唐良智曾在此攻读硕士研究生并担任技术员。
description.en: Tang Liangzhi studied for his master's degree and worked as a technician here.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of China.

nodes.id: 武汉东湖新技术开发区

zh-cn: 武汉东湖新技术开发区
en: Wuhan East Lake High-tech Development Zone

description.zh-cn: 位于中国武汉市的国家级高新技术产业开发区，唐良智曾长期在此工作。
description.en: A national high-tech industrial development zone in Wuhan, China, where Tang Liangzhi worked for a long period.

nodes.id: 中国共产党硚口区委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党硚口区委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在武汉市硚口区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Qiaokou District, Wuhan.

description.zh-cn: 中国武汉市硚口区的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative body of Qiaokou District, Wuhan, China.

description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Xiangyang City (formerly Xiangfan).

description.zh-cn: 中国襄阳市（原襄樊市）的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative body of Xiangyang City (formerly Xiangfan), China.

zh-cn: 襄阳市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 襄阳市（原襄樊市）人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Xiangyang (formerly Xiangfan) Municipal People's Congress.

description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Wuhan.

description.zh-cn: 中国武汉市的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative body of Wuhan, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在成都市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Chengdu.

description.zh-cn: 中国成都市的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative body of Chengdu, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在重庆市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Chongqing.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会
en: 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的一次全国代表大会，唐良智在此次大会上当选为中央委员会候补委员。
description.en: A national congress of the CPC, during which Tang Liangzhi was elected as an alternate member of the Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会
en: 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会选举产生的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body elected by the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国重庆市的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative body of Chongqing, China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议安徽省委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议安徽省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在安徽省的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物。在唐良智担任重庆市市长期间，陈敏尔担任中共重庆市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician. While Tang Liangzhi served as Mayor of Chongqing, Chen Min'er was the Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，唐良智的前任重庆市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Tang Liangzhi's predecessor as Mayor of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，唐良智的继任重庆市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Tang Liangzhi's successor as Mayor of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，唐良智的前任中共成都市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Tang Liangzhi's predecessor as Secretary of the CPC Chengdu Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，唐良智的继任中共成都市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Tang Liangzhi's successor as Secretary of the CPC Chengdu Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，唐良智的前任成都市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Tang Liangzhi's predecessor as Mayor of Chengdu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，唐良智的继任成都市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Tang Liangzhi's successor as Mayor of Chengdu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，唐良智的前任武汉市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Tang Liangzhi's predecessor as Mayor of Wuhan.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，唐良智的继任武汉市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Tang Liangzhi's successor as Mayor of Wuhan.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，唐良智的前任襄樊市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Tang Liangzhi's predecessor as Mayor of Xiangfan.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，唐良智的继任襄樊市市长和中共襄樊市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Tang Liangzhi's successor as Mayor of Xiangfan and Secretary of the CPC Xiangfan Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，唐良智的继任中共重庆市委专职副书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Tang Liangzhi's successor as full-time Deputy Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，唐良智的前任中共襄樊市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Tang Liangzhi's predecessor as Secretary of the CPC Xiangfan Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，唐良智的前任安徽省政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, Tang Liangzhi's predecessor as Chairman of the Anhui Provincial CPPCC.

degree.zh-cn: 半导体物理与器件专业本科
degree.en: Bachelor's degree in Semiconductor Physics and Devices

description.zh-cn: 在华中工学院（现华中科技大学）固体电子系就读本科。
description.en: Studied for his bachelor's degree in the Department of Solid State Electronics at Huazhong Institute of Technology (now Huazhong University of Science and Technology).

relationships.target: 邮电部邮电科学研究院

description.zh-cn: 在邮电部邮电科学研究院研究生部上海第一研究所攻读硕士研究生。
description.en: Studied for his master's degree at the First Research Institute in Shanghai, Graduate Department of the Academy of Posts and Telecommunications Sciences, Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications.

description.zh-cn: 在华中科技大学以在职博士研究生身份主修西方经济学专业，并获得经济学博士学位。
description.en: Majored in Western Economics as an on-the-job doctoral student at Huazhong University of Science and Technology and obtained a Ph.D. in Economics.

description.zh-cn: 1982年7月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in July 1982.

relationships.target: 邮电部邮电科学研究院

description.zh-cn: 在邮电部武汉邮电科学研究院任技术员。
description.en: Worked as a technician at the Wuhan Research Institute of Posts and Telecommunications, Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications.

relationships.target: 武汉东湖新技术开发区

position.zh-cn: 办公室主任科员、新技术创业中心副主任、党委书记、管委会政策法规处副处长、处长、东湖高新技术股份公司总经理、管委会副主任、党委副书记
position.en: Chief Staff Member of the Office, Deputy Director and Party Secretary of the New Technology Venture Center, Deputy Director and Director of the Policy and Regulation Division of the Management Committee, General Manager of East Lake High-tech Co., Ltd., Deputy Director and Deputy Party Secretary of the Management Committee

relationships.target: 中国共产党硚口区委员会

position.en: Deputy Secretary of the District Committee

relationships.target: 武汉东湖新技术开发区

position.zh-cn: 管委会主任、工委副书记、工委书记
position.en: Director of the Management Committee, Deputy Secretary and Secretary of the Working Committee

中国共产党襄阳市委员会
襄阳市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 唐良智在担任中共襄樊市委书记后，兼任市人大常委会主任。
description.en: After becoming the Secretary of the CPC Xiangfan Municipal Committee, Tang Liangzhi also served as the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 唐良智在中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会上当选为中国共产党第十九届中央委员会候补委员。
description.en: Tang Liangzhi was elected as an alternate member of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China at the 19th National Congress of the CPC.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会
中国人民政治协商会议安徽省委员会

description.zh-cn: 在唐良智担任重庆市市长期间，陈敏尔是其上级，担任中共重庆市委书记。
description.en: While Tang Liangzhi served as Mayor of Chongqing, Chen Min'er was his superior, serving as the Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 唐良智接替张国清，担任重庆市人民政府市长。
description.en: Tang Liangzhi succeeded Zhang Guoqing as Mayor of the Chongqing Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 胡衡华接替唐良智，担任重庆市人民政府市长。
description.en: Hu Henghua succeeded Tang Liangzhi as Mayor of the Chongqing Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 唐良智接替黄新初，担任中国共产党成都市委员会书记。
description.en: Tang Liangzhi succeeded Huang Xinchu as Secretary of the CPC Chengdu Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 范锐平接替唐良智，担任中国共产党成都市委员会书记。
description.en: Fan Ruiping succeeded Tang Liangzhi as Secretary of the CPC Chengdu Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 唐良智接替葛红林，担任成都市人民政府市长。
description.en: Tang Liangzhi succeeded Ge Honglin as Mayor of the Chengdu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 罗强接替唐良智，担任成都市人民政府市长。
description.en: Luo Qiang succeeded Tang Liangzhi as Mayor of the Chengdu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 唐良智接替阮成发，担任武汉市人民政府市长。
description.en: Tang Liangzhi succeeded Ruan Chengfa as Mayor of the Wuhan Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 万勇接替唐良智，担任武汉市人民政府市长。
description.en: Wan Yong succeeded Tang Liangzhi as Mayor of the Wuhan Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 唐良智接替李德炳，担任襄樊市人民政府市长。
description.en: Tang Liangzhi succeeded Li Debing as Mayor of the Xiangfan Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 李新华接替唐良智，担任襄樊市人民政府市长。
description.en: Li Xinhua succeeded Tang Liangzhi as Mayor of the Xiangfan Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 任学锋接替唐良智，担任中国共产党重庆市委员会专职副书记。
description.en: Ren Xuefeng succeeded Tang Liangzhi as full-time Deputy Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 唐良智接替田承忠，担任中国共产党襄樊市委员会书记。
description.en: Tang Liangzhi succeeded Tian Chengzhong as Secretary of the CPC Xiangfan Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李新华接替唐良智，担任中国共产党襄樊市委员会书记。
description.en: Li Xinhua succeeded Tang Liangzhi as Secretary of the CPC Xiangfan Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 唐良智接替张昌尔，担任中国人民政治协商会议安徽省委员会主席。
description.en: Tang Liangzhi succeeded Zhang Chang'er as Chairman of the Anhui Provincial Committee of the CPPCC.
